name: Chrysalis Leadership & Coaching
description: Chrysalis is a global leader in providing comprehensive coaching and training services for both individuals and groups. Our internationally recognized coaching methodologies have consistently delivered outstanding outcomes. With over 1000 coaching and training sessions conducted across more than 30 countries, including engagements with Fortune 500 companies and tech start-ups, our expertise in human growth and transformation is extensive. Based in Singapore, our team offers both in-person and virtual sessions.
features: We create a customized action plan for each participant to ensure a clear direction and actionable steps towards their goals.

Pre-training worksheets are available to help participants prepare their thoughts prior to each session. This enables both parties to come fully prepared and ready to engage in productive and effective work.
Our program includes unlimited email support to ensure that participants stay on track throughout their growth journey.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline:
NAVIGATING CHANGE,
 ACCELERATING
 TRANSFORMATION
ShortDescription: Chrysalis is a global leader in providing comprehensive coaching and training services for both individuals and groups.
enhanced_description: Chrysalis Leadership & Coaching is a global leader specializing in comprehensive coaching and training services for individuals and groups, aimed at navigating change and accelerating transformation. Based in Singapore, they offer both in-person and virtual sessions, with a proven track record of over 1000 sessions conducted across more than 30 countries, including engagements with Fortune 500 companies and tech start-ups. Their internationally recognized coaching methodologies are designed for human growth and transformation, consistently delivering outstanding outcomes. Key differentiators include customized action plans for each participant to ensure clear direction, pre-training worksheets to maximize session productivity, and unlimited email support for continuous progress tracking.
competitive_advantages: Global leadership in coaching and training services
Extensive global experience with over 1000 sessions in 30+ countries
Proven track record with Fortune 500 companies and tech start-ups
Customized action plans for personalized goal achievement
Pre-training worksheets for enhanced session preparation and effectiveness
Unlimited email support for continuous participant guidance
Flexible delivery options including both in-person and virtual sessions
scalability_features: Services provided globally across more than 30 countries
Engages with a wide range of clients from tech start-ups to Fortune 500 companies
Offers coaching and training for both individuals and groups
